column7: Dancing Techniques is an umbrella course for courses not regularly taught in the department and provides student with the physical study of various dance techniques. Topics reflect specializations or new forms of dance such as House, Vogueing, Clogging, Capoiera, Balinese dance, etc. May be repeated in the same term to a maximum of 2 hours and in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Restricted to Dance Majors.
column9: May be repeated in the same term to a maximum of 2 hours and in separate terms to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: Restricted to Dance Majors.
